channel.title: Fantastic Four: First Steps on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Fantastic Four: First Steps on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: From the MCU to Edinburgh: Ralph Ineson on ‘Two Neighbors,’ ‘Fantastic Four’ and Preferring “Less Untamed Aggression” on Female-Directed Sets
item.description: The British star says of Ondine Viñao’s dark comedy: “I don’t think anybody will have had a budget drop from film-to-film as I’ve had with ‘The Fantastic Four’ to ‘Two Neighbors.’”

item.title: From the MCU to Edinburgh: Ralph Ineson on ‘Two Neighbors,’ ‘Fantastic Four’ and Preferring “Less Untamed Aggression” on Female-Directed Sets
item.description: The British star says of Ondine Viñao’s dark comedy: “I don’t think anybody will have had a budget drop from film-to-film as I’ve had with ‘The Fantastic Four’ to ‘Two Neighbors.’”

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Blazes to $42.5M Opening, ‘Freakier Friday’ Smiles Wide With $29M Bow
item.description: New Line’s horror pic and Disney’s family comedy delivered a double win at the late summer box office, as well as a victory for two challenged genres.

item.title: Box Office: ‘Weapons’ Blazes to $42.5M Opening, ‘Freakier Friday’ Smiles Wide With $29M Bow
item.description: New Line’s horror pic and Disney’s family comedy delivered a double win at the late summer box office, as well as a victory for two challenged genres.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Solid $118M U.S. Box Office Launch, $218M Globally
item.description: The movie’s performance is a needed win for Kevin Feige’s Marvel Studios as it takes over the family-friendly, comic book franchise for the first time.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Solid $118M U.S. Box Office Launch, $218M Globally
item.description: The movie’s performance is a needed win for Kevin Feige’s Marvel Studios as it takes over the family-friendly, comic book franchise for the first time.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four’ Box Office: ‘First Steps’ Pacing for $120M-$125M Launch in Notable Win for Marvel
item.description: Outside of ‘Deadpool & Wolverine,’ the reboot looks to score the best domestic opening for Kevin Feige’s superhero studio since 2022’s ‘Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.’

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four’ Box Office: ‘First Steps’ Pacing for $120M-$125M Launch in Notable Win for Marvel
item.description: Outside of ‘Deadpool & Wolverine,’ the reboot looks to score the best domestic opening for Kevin Feige’s superhero studio since 2022’s ‘Black Panther: Wakanda Forever.’

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Marvelous $24.4M in Box Office Previews
item.description: The acclaimed movie scored the top preview of the year to date and the best since fellow Marvel superhero pic ‘Deadpool & Wolverine’ exactly a year ago.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Marvelous $24.4M in Box Office Previews
item.description: The acclaimed movie scored the top preview of the year to date and the best since fellow Marvel superhero pic ‘Deadpool & Wolverine’ exactly a year ago.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Promising $24.4M in Box Office Previews as Marvel Seeks Redemption
item.description: The acclaimed movie — which scored the top preview of the year to date ahead of ‘Superman’ - features an all-star cast led by Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn and Vincent Ebon Moss-Bachrach.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Rockets to Promising $24.4M in Box Office Previews as Marvel Seeks Redemption
item.description: The acclaimed movie — which scored the top preview of the year to date ahead of ‘Superman’ - features an all-star cast led by Pedro Pascal, Vanessa Kirby, Joseph Quinn and Vincent Ebon Moss-Bachrach.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Star Vanessa Kirby Says Fake Belly in Movie Was Heavier Than Her Actual Bump
item.description: The actress is currently pregnant with her first child with her boyfriend, Paul Rabil.

item.title: ‘Fantastic Four: First Steps’ Star Vanessa Kirby Says Fake Belly in Movie Was Heavier Than Her Actual Bump
item.description: The actress is currently pregnant with her first child with her boyfriend, Paul Rabil.

item.title: Why Pedro Pascal Never Wants to Be Clean Shaven for a Role Ever Again Unless It’s “Completely Necessary”
item.description: The actor previously shaved his face for 2020’s ‘Wonder Woman 1984.’

item.title: Why Pedro Pascal Never Wants to Be Clean Shaven for a Role Ever Again Unless It’s “Completely Necessary”
item.description: The actor previously shaved his face for 2020’s ‘Wonder Woman 1984.’
